languages.text: {n}Оба — и комендант, и палач — перестают препираться и бросают на вас изумленные взгляды. Впрочем, быстро придя в себя, они глубоко вам кланяются, более не нарушая торжественной тишины своими пререканиями.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: FW_Knight_name выходит на середину помоста, опускается на колено (можем сделать уникальный блюпринт с отличающейся внешкой главного военачальника).

traits.locale_text: {n}Один из рыцарей выходит вперед и опускается на колено.{/n} "Я Тургулак Грумз по прозвищу "Неустрашимый", военачальник крепости, благодарю вас за ваше безграничное милосердие, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Я распоряжусь немедленно усилить надзор за площадью и ее окрестностями и клянусь боле не допускать подобных происшествий. Ибо мечом и щитом служим мы Империуму! И во тьме, и во крови!"

languages.translation_comment: FW_Knight_name выходит на середину помоста, опускается на колено (можем сделать уникальный блюпринт с отличающейся внешкой главного военачальника).

languages.text: {n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Оба — и комендант, и палач — перестают препираться и бросают на вас изумленные взгляды. Впрочем, быстро придя в себя, они глубоко вам кланяются, более не нарушая торжественной тишины своими пререканиями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; however, they quickly recover and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}

{n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}

{n}One of the knights steps forward and drops to one knee.{/n} "I am Turgulak Grumes, known as 'the Undaunted,' commander of the fortress. Thank you for your boundless mercy, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will immediately increase the surveillance of the square and its surroundings, and I swear to prevent any more incidents of this kind. For we serve the Imperium with sword and shield! In darkness and in blood!"

{n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}

{n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}
{n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; however, they quickly recover and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}

{n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到你的话之后，指挥官和刽子手立刻停止了争吵，一脸震惊地看着你。随后，他们很快恢复了镇定，保持着肃穆的沉默，向你深深地鞠了一躬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的话之后，指挥官和刽子手立刻停止了争吵，一脸震惊地看着你。随后，他们很快恢复了镇定，保持着肃穆的沉默，向你深深地鞠了一躬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El comandante y el verdugo dejan de reñir y se vuelven para mirarte, mudos de asombro; no obstante, enseguida se recomponen y te ofrecen sus más profundas reverencias, guardando un respetuoso silencio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El comandante y el verdugo dejan de reñir y se vuelven para mirarte, mudos de asombro; no obstante, enseguida se recomponen y te ofrecen sus más profundas reverencias, guardando un respetuoso silencio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Komutan ve cellat, atışmayı bırakıp gözlerini hayretle sana çeviriyor. Kısa sürede kendilerine geliyor ve ortamdaki ciddi sessizliği koruyarak sana reveransta bulunuyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Komutan ve cellat, atışmayı bırakıp gözlerini hayretle sana çeviriyor. Kısa sürede kendilerine geliyor ve ortamdaki ciddi sessizliği koruyarak sana reveransta bulunuyorlar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}司令官と処刑人は言い争いをやめ、驚いてあなたの方に目を向ける。彼らはすぐに気を取り直すが、深々とあなたに頭を下げ、厳粛な静寂を保つ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}司令官と処刑人は言い争いをやめ、驚いてあなたの方に目を向ける。彼らはすぐに気を取り直すが、深々とあなたに頭を下げ、厳粛な静寂を保つ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le commandant et le bourreau cessent de se disputer et tournent vers vous un regard stupéfait. Puis, ils se ressaisissent rapidement et se confondent en profondes révérences, tout en observant un silence solennel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commandant et le bourreau cessent de se disputer et tournent vers vous un regard stupéfait. Puis, ils se ressaisissent rapidement et se confondent en profondes révérences, tout en observant un silence solennel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Kommandant und der Henker hören auf zu streiten und wenden sich erstaunt zu dir. Schließlich verneigen sie sich feierlich schweigend vor dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commander and the executioner stop their bickering and turn their eyes to you in astonishment; they quickly recover, however, and offer you their deepest bows, maintaining a solemn silence.{/n}
